name: learning with kyle & friends
description:
Welcome to the future of gaming!

"learning with kyle & friends" is a new-breakthrough of learning games for kids and kids at heart. with it's appealing to all ages designs and *hot* gameplay, "learning with kyle & friends" is the number 1 kids and kids at heart game for any kids, children, grandchildren and great grandchildren. 

learning with kyle and friends is the next step in entertainment for kids. it is very special, exciting, fun, new and the learning element is amazing. 

"learning with kyle & friends" is the next step in the evolution of entertainment and there is a reason why this game is the #1 game on the market. 

if you didn't like dave and bambi or any other dave-related media - this product of inspired art will will not be for you. because learning is not a chore it is FUN. and that's just the way it is. 

you are the ones that ruin this community with your hate. just leave the rest of us alone. i'm sick of seeing it.

song in the gameplay taken from ThingerthingCH (IM SORRY)
